Name: Dominion Laborer
Description:
Basic worker unit. Can gather resources, build structures, and repair. Can switch to a Trooper suit.

Can attack ground units.

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to move to the target area or follow the target unit. Moving units will not engage enemies.
Root.Name: Move

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to cancel all orders and stop moving.
Root.Name: Stop

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to stay where they are and attack enemies that are within range. Units will neither chase down enemies nor move to engage.
Root.Name: Hold Position

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to move to the target point, fighting nearby enemies along the way. Targeting a unit with the Attack command orders that it be attacked until it is destroyed.
Root.Name: Attack

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to patrol between their current position and the target area. Units will attack enemies and move to engage nearby enemies.
Root.Name: Patrol

Root.Tooltip: Restores life to mechanical units and structures at the cost of resources.
Root.Name: Repair

Root.Tooltip: Orders Laborer to gather resources from a selected Mineral Field or Vespene Geyser.
Root.Name: Gather

Root.Tooltip: Returns the carried resources to the nearest drop-off point.
Root.Name: Return Cargo

Root.Tooltip: Halts construction of this structure. The partial construction will remain.
Root.Name: Halt

Root.Tooltip: Orders the Laborer to switch to a Trooper suit at the nearest Enlistment Center or Supply Bunker.
Root.Name: Report for Combat

Root.Tooltip: Orders the unit to apply your currently selected spray to the terrain at the target location.
Root.Name: Spray

Root.Tooltip: Multiple Laborers and Troopers can build a structure, reducing its construction time.
Root.Name: Working Crew

Root.Tooltip: This ability unlocks at Commander Level 5.
Root.Name: Will of the People

Root.Tooltip: When this unit becomes Indoctrinated by an Imperial Witness, it increases Imperial Support by 1. Each point of Imperial Support generates 1 Imperial Mandate every 240 seconds.
Root.Name: Will of the People

TBl1.Tooltip:
Primary structure. Used to receive gathered resources and covert Dominion Laborers and Dominion Troopers. Can use the Lift Off ability.

Enables:
- Dominion Laborers
- Dominion Troopers
- Supply Bunkers from Laborers and Troopers
TBl1.Name: Build Enlistment Center

TBl1.Tooltip: Built over a Vespene Geyser to allow harvesting of vespene gas.
TBl1.Name: Build Refinery

TBl1.Tooltip:
Royal Guard Infantry-production facility.

Enables:
- Aegis Guards
TBl1.Name: Build Barracks

TBl1.Tooltip:
Anti-air defensive structure.

Can attack air units.
Detector
TBl1.Name: Build Missile Turret

TBl1.Tooltip:
Contains upgrades for Dominion Troopers and structures.

Enables:
- Missile Turrets from Laborers and Troopers
- Earthsplitter Ordnance from Laborers and Troopers
TBl1.Name: Build Engineering Bay

TBl1.Tooltip: Drops the current order without performing it, and allows you to select a different order.
TBl1.Name: Cancel

TBl1.Tooltip:
Defensive structure that provides supply.
Supply allows you to create more units.
Troopers fight from inside.

Bonus: +1 range to units inside.
TBl1.Name: Build Supply Bunker

TBl1.Tooltip: This unit unlocks at Commander Level 3.
TBl1.Name: Build Earthsplitter Ordnance

TBl1.Tooltip:
Randomly bombards near a target location, dealing damage to ground units in the area. Enables Contaminated Strike from the top panel.

Can attack ground units.
TBl1.Name: Build Earthsplitter Ordnance

TBl2.Tooltip:
Contains upgrades for Aegis Guards and Emperor's Shadows. Can build Tactical Missiles for Emperor's Shadows.

Enables:
- Emperor's Shadows at the Barracks
TBl2.Name: Build Royal Academy

TBl2.Tooltip:
Royal Guard vehicle-production facility.

Enables:
- Shock Divisions
TBl2.Name: Build Factory

TBl2.Tooltip:
Contains upgrades for Factory and Starport units.

Enables:
- Blackhammers at the Factory
TBl2.Name: Build Armory

TBl2.Tooltip:
Imperial and Royal Guard air-unit production facility.

Enables:
- Imperial Intercessors
- Imperial Witnesses
- Sky Furies
TBl2.Name: Build Starport

TBl2.Tooltip:
Contains upgrades for Starport units.

Enables:
- Pride of Augustgrads at the Starport
TBl2.Name: Build Fusion Core

TBl2.Tooltip: Drops the current order without performing it, and allows you to select a different order.
TBl2.Name: Cancel
